data.displayName: Amber Plan + CommBank Everyday Plus: Variable Wholesale Prices (estimate only, based on last 12 months of data)

fees.description: Membership of $22 per month (inc. GST) to access these wholesale rates.
Standard Connection Fee. Actual charges passed through from your distributor may vary, see www.amber.com.au/fees for more information
Standard Disconnection Fee. Actual charges passed through from your distributor may vary, see www.amber.com.au/fees for more information
An $3 (inc. GST) fee applies if payment is dishonoured or reversed.
A $16 (inc. GST) fee applies if full payment has not been received by the invoice due date
A fee of 1% applies to payments made by credit or debit card

electricityContract.terms: Prices are not fixed. All usage is charged at the same wholesale electricity costs charged to us. Our bill guarantee sets the maximum average rates we charge over a calendar quarter. For general usage this is 34.38c/kWh. You are also protected by Amber’s annual bill guarantee published on our website (including solar FIT if applicable). Full terms and conditions at https://www.amber.com.au/terms.

discounts.description: Welcome credit of $150 applied over 6 months. New residential customers only who are also customers of CommBank (CBA) in the Yello Everyday Plus segment. Must link CBA credit card or bank account as Amber payment method. Customers ineligible to receive any remaining credit months if they cancel their Amber account, switch their payment method to a non-CBA account, or their CBA card expires. Additional eligibility requirements apply, see Amber website.
discounts.displayName: Amber Plan + CommBank Everyday Plus Offer

electricityContract.variation: Prices are not fixed. Amber passes through wholesale electricity prices directly at the cost to us. The usage price here is an estimate based on an average of the last 12 months of wholesale prices. Visit www.amber.com.au/how-it-works

eligibility.information: Conditional offer to new residential customers (who are also customers of Commonwealth Bank of Australia) in CitiPower's distribution region with flat rate, TOU or demand tariff. For illustrative purposes, tariff C1R assumed. Feed-In Tariffs only valid if applicable

solarFeedInTariff.description: Solar FiT c/kWh exported (incl. GST if applicable)
Solar PFiT if eligible, c/kWh exported (inc. GST if applicable)

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: No lock in contracts or exit fees.
